content: Whether I'm consulting, assessing a site's accessibility, or writing code, I want to make every website, product and interface as intuitive, inclusive and enjoyable as possible. No-one should be excluded!
heading: Inclusion

content: I highly value learning and like to give back to others where I can. I'm particularly keen to mentor tech-curious women, those with disabilities, non-binary or LGBTQ+ people and all other minority groups.
heading: Mentoring

heading: Animal Welfare
